allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add chart with position/order lines and Bollinger Bands

- Replace TradingView iframe with Lightweight Charts library
- Add 15min candlestick chart from Binance API
- Display Bollinger Bands \(20-period, 2 std dev\)
- Show entry position line \(red\) with PnL
- Show open order lines \(blue, dashed\)
- Highlight coins near BB upper with green background

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
